statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

articles.headline: Pelicans rule Zion Williamson out with bone contusion in foot
articles.description: Pelicans forward Zion Williamson is out for Monday's matchup against the Boston Celtics due to a left foot bone contusion.

articles.headline: Hornets' Brandon Miller sidelined with shoulder subluxation
articles.description: Hornets guard Brandon Miller will miss his second straight game with a left shoulder subluxation and will be evaluated again on Oct. 29.

images.name: Brandon Miller [600x400]
images.credit: Photo by Jesse D. Garrabrant/NBAE via Getty Images

articles.headline: How are the Trail Blazers dealing with Chauncey Billups' absence?
articles.description: Ramona Shelburne explains how Chauncey Billups' leave is impacting the Trail Blazers.

images.name: How are the Trail Blazers dealing with Chauncey Billups' absence?
images.caption: Ramona Shelburne explains how Chauncey Billups' leave is impacting the Trail Blazers.

articles.headline: NBA gambling investigation: Latest statements, updates
articles.description: Trail Blazers coach Chauncey Billups, Heat guard Terry Rozier and former Cavs player Damon Jones have been arrested in connection with the probes.

images.name: Terry Rozier and Chauncey Billups [1296x729]
images.caption: Heat player Terry Rozier and Trail Blazers coach Chauncey Billups have been arrested in connection to a pair of federal investigations regarding illegal sports betting and rigged poker games.

images.name: Shams shares updates on arrests of Terry Rozier, Chauncey Billups
images.caption: Shams Charania joins "Get Up" to report on Terry Rozier and Chauncey Billups being arrested as a part of an FBI gambling inquiry.

articles.headline: Sources: Timberwolves' Anthony Edwards to miss 2 weeks
articles.description: Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards will miss two weeks with a right hamstring strain, sources told ESPN.

images.name: Anthony Edwards [1296x729]
images.caption: Anthony Edwards stands alone as a Tier 1 shooting guard.
images.alt: Minnesota Timberwolves guard Anthony Edwards (5) dribbles against the Philadelphia 76ers in the first quarter at Target Center.

images.name: Anthony Edwards scores before exiting game
images.caption: After Anthony Edwards scores early in the Timberwolves' game vs. the Pacers, he exits with a right hamstring strain.

articles.headline: NBA memo addresses the need to assess 'dire risks' of gambling
articles.description: An NBA memo sent to teams said the league is reassessing its measures on legal sports betting, how it should be regulated and ways to protect players from "dire risks."

article.headline: Detroit faces conference foe Cleveland
article.description: Cleveland Cavaliers (2-1, sixth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Detroit Pistons (2-1, eighth in the Eastern Conference)
article.title: Detroit faces conference foe Cleveland
article.story: Cleveland Cavaliers (2-1, sixth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Detroit Pistons (2-1, eighth in the Eastern Conference) Detroit; Monday, 7 p.m. EDT Cavaliers -2.5; over/under is 231.5 BOTTOM LINE: Cleveland visits Detroit for an Eastern Conference matchup. Detroit finished 44-38 overall and 29-23 in Eastern Conference games last season. The Pistons gave up 113.6 points per game while committing 20.7 fouls last season. Cleveland finished 64-18 overall and 12-4 in Central Division action during the 2024-25 season. The Cavaliers averaged 8.2 steals, 4.3 blocks and 12.5 turnovers per game last season. INJURIES: Pistons: Caris LeVert: day to day (knee), Marcus Sasser: day to day (hip), Jaden Ivey: out (knee). Cavaliers: Max Strus: out (foot), Darius Garland: out (toe). ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
